body_html:
No problem. Yes, I am aware I'm using internal APIs that might change and totally understand that. I guess pointing out such issues related to how I am using those APIs might help with evolving the public API.

On another note, what happened to the nightly-libtensorflow CI builds? They seem to have been removed. Is there some alternative I could use? I was using them to obtain cross-compiled binaries to package with my Scala library.

body:
No problem. Yes, I am aware I'm using internal APIs that might change and totally understand that. I guess pointing out such issues related to how I am using those APIs might help with evolving the public API.

On another note, what happened to the `nightly-libtensorflow` CI builds? They seem to have been removed. Is there some alternative I could use? I was using them to obtain cross-compiled binaries to package with my Scala library.
